languages.text: {n}Под цепким взглядом Абеляра вы крайне ловко имитируете мигрень, не выходя из роли.{/n}
{n}You put on such a convincing show of having a headache that even Abelard's keen gaze is fooled by your deception.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Под цепким взглядом Абеляра вы крайне ловко имитируете мигрень, не выходя из роли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You manage to fake a migraine with great aplomb under Abelard's keen eye.{/n}
{n}You manage to fake a migraine with great aplomb under Abelard's keen eye.{/n}
{n}You put on such a convincing show of having a headache that even Abelard's keen gaze is fooled by your deception.{/n}

{n}You put on such a convincing show of having a headache that even Abelard's keen gaze is fooled by your deception.{/n}
{n}You put on such a convincing show of having a headache that even Abelard's keen gaze is fooled by your deception.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous feignez si bien d'avoir une migraine que même le regard perçant d'Abélard se laisse duper par votre simulacre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You put on such a convincing show of having a headache that even Abelard's keen gaze is fooled by your deception.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous feignez si bien d'avoir une migraine que même le regard perçant d'Abélard se laisse duper par votre simulacre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Haces tal interpretación de sufrir una jaqueca que consigues engañar incluso a la mirada experta de Abelard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You put on such a convincing show of having a headache that even Abelard's keen gaze is fooled by your deception.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Haces tal interpretación de sufrir una jaqueca que consigues engañar incluso a la mirada experta de Abelard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你装出一副头痛难忍的样子，演技十分逼真，就连目光如炬的阿贝拉德都被你骗过去了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You put on such a convincing show of having a headache that even Abelard's keen gaze is fooled by your deception.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你装出一副头痛难忍的样子，演技十分逼真，就连目光如炬的阿贝拉德都被你骗过去了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは頭痛があるふりをした。アベラルドの鋭い視線にさえあなたに騙されている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You put on such a convincing show of having a headache that even Abelard's keen gaze is fooled by your deception.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは頭痛があるふりをした。アベラルドの鋭い視線にさえあなたに騙されている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast so überzeugend schlimme Kopfschmerzen vorgespielt, dass selbst Abelards scharfer Blick getäuscht wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You put on such a convincing show of having a headache that even Abelard's keen gaze is fooled by your deception.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hast so überzeugend schlimme Kopfschmerzen vorgespielt, dass selbst Abelards scharfer Blick getäuscht wird.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Baş ağrısı yaşadığına dair o kadar inandırıcı rol yapıyorsun ki Abelard'ın keskin bakışlarını bile aldatmayı başarıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You put on such a convincing show of having a headache that even Abelard's keen gaze is fooled by your deception.{/n}
